title: Gautam Kumar
text: Last month se groww app bahut hi ghatiya service de rhi hai, wallet me find show ni karta jab trading opportunity milta hai to .hamesha issue rahega .. Mera is app me mutual fund me v investment hai nahi to mai isko un install kar deta. üòîüòîüòî Today i.e on 16th July 2025 , I just made one trade, bought and sold Sensex call price of Rs. 47 for which brokerage charges were 83 Rs. As Grow charges only Rs. 20. It just fools the public. No one receives the call on the customer care number.

title: Rahul
text: It doesn't have trade on charts using visual chart orders like dhan. Plz introduce the feature. Why doesn't VWAP indicator work for indices like it works on Tradingview? Many key indicators and tools are missing

title: Harish Sharma

title: Satish A
text: update: Now nominees can be updated digitally. ######## Probably the worst service provider. Account opening is only the digital process and that too forced on mobile device, even the signature is also drawing on the screen. Later on even to change any details like nomination it's all old aged practice of couriering documents and affidavits etc. I guess if we face any problem these guys show us starts. Stay away if yours are huge investments.
author: Satish A
